name: Grim Nights - Elven Curse
detailed_description:
All new content in an all new strategic adventure: Play as elves and defend against hordes of demons. All new units, enemies, buildings, map and music. Introducing spells and magic into the world of Grim Nights. A colourful experience packed with action.

- 11 elven buildings.
- 8 elven units.
- 8 demon mobs.
- 3 demon bosses.
- New portraits for units and mobs.
- New music.
- Roughly 5-6 hours of new game play.
- New achievements.

So, yeah, cool stuff! Hope you like it =)
